snippet.title: The Spirit of the Samurai Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
New gameplay from The Spirit of the Samurai debuted during the Future Games Show at Gamescom. This hand-crafted action adventure, inspired by Japanese mythology, is coming to PC in Fall 2024.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#Spiritofthesamurai #FutureGamesShow #FGS #gamescom
